SCRIPT.MSCRI:
@echo off !-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Nexus URL" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_BASE_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_REPOSITORY#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_FILE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Artifact Classifier" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_CLASSIFIER#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Artifact Extension" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_EXTENSION#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Group ID" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_GROUP_ID#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Artifact ID" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_ARTIFACT_ID#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Version" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_VERSION#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Generate POM" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_GNT_POM#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Packaging type" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_PACKAGING#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!--------------------------------------------------Building java argumnets--------------------------------
! Action name : SET &UC4RB_NXS_ACTION_NAME# = "UploadMavenArtifactAction"
! Define java options and values : DEFINE &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#, string, 24
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[2] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[3] = "-baseurl" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_BASE_URL#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[4] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[5] = "-username" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_USERNAME#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[6] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[7] = "-groupid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_GROUP_ID#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[8] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[9] = "-artifactid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_ARTIFACT_ID#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[10] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[11] = "-version" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_VERSION#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[12] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[13] = "-repository" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_REPOSITORY#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[14] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[15] = "-packaging" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_PACKAGING#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[16] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[17] = "-classifier" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_CLASSIFIER#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[18] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[19] = "-extension" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_EXTENSION#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[20] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[21] = "-filepath" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_FILE#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[22] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[23] = "-generatepom" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_GNT_POM#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[24] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
! Access key is decrypted and send to jar as argument : IF &UC4RB_NXS_PASSWORD# <> "" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_NXS_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD : ENDIF
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
:P &UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# ! Attach Java Resource :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
! Invoking java binary java -jar &UC4RB_NXS_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# -password "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%"
!----------------------------------------- Status messages ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** UPLOAD ARTIFACT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** UPLOAD ARTIFACT ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@WIN
